WorkItem.Description:
Changing the .chirp.less suffix to just .less (in the setting) don't seems to work.

I'm not sure why, but after restarting VS, it is working.

Comments.Message:
Is work in my test project.
1. Create file test.less
2. Change setting to .less
3. open file test.less
4. Save file (css is generate)

The css is generate on file save.

More detail : 
Visual studio version ?
file name before changing configuration ?
ploufs -- you're right. You have to resave the file in order to update. But couldn't we auto-update the project on config changes?
I don't sure what happened, but now it's working good.
